items.sentence: Tom says he doesn\'t know how to solve the problem.
Tom says he hasn\'t had a nightmare in a long time.
I think you know what Tom\'s girlfriend\'s name is.
I\'m worn out, because I\'ve been standing all day.
Tom wants me to go to another party after this one.
Tom wants me to keep helping Mary in any way I can.
Tom was able to do the work without any difficulty.
When was the last time Tom took Mary out to dinner?
When was the last time you asked somebody for help?
When was the last time you saw Tom ride a unicycle?
